Overview

Dress up in this straight kurta with an adorable embroidered design on the yoke, a round neck, a button placket, three-quarter sleeves, and a knee-length construction. Pair this kurta with palazzos and sandals for an elegant look.

  • Net Quantity : 1 Number
  • Product : Kurta
  • Type : Straight
  • Design : Embroidered
  • Neckline : Round Neck
  • Length : Knee-Length
  • Sleeve Length : 3/4th Sleeves
  • Fabric : Cotton
  • Care Instructions : Machine Wash
  • Model Wears : Size S,has Height 5'7",Chest 33",and Waist 28"
  • Country of Origin : India
  • Manufactured By : Lifestyle Int Pvt Ltd, 77 Degree Town Centre, Building No. 3, West Wing, Off HAL Airport Road, Yamlur, Bangalore-560037, Karnataka.
  • For Consumer Complaints Contact : Manager Commercial,77 Degree Town Centre, Building No. 3, West Wing, Off HAL Airport Road, Yamlur PO., Bangalore-560037, Phone: 1800-123-1444, help.in@maxfashion.com
